## Documentation Issue Type
What type of documentation issue are you reporting?
- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incomplete documentation  
- [ ] Incorrect/Outdated information
- [ ] Unclear or confusing explanations
- [ ] Code examples that don't work
- [ ] Poor formatting or structure
- [ ] Broken links
- [ ] Translation issues
- [ ] Accessibility problems

## Document/File Information
**File/Documentation Section:**
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] QUICK_START.md
- [ ] TROUBLESHOOTING.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Setup Guide
- [ ] Component Documentation
- [ ] API Documentation
- [ ] Other: [Specify]

**Section/Page:** [e.g. "Getting Started", "Testing Guide", "Troubleshooting"]

Describe what's currently documented or what's missing:

## Expected Documentation
Describe what should be documented instead:

Why is this documentation important? Who would benefit from this improvement?

// Current example (if any)
const example = "What's wrong with this code";

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the documentation issue:

## Priority
- [ ] Low - Minor wording or formatting issue
- [ ] Medium - Affects developer experience but workarounds exist
- [ ] High - Missing critical information that blocks progress
- [ ] Critical - Documentation is completely wrong or missing

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Documentation has been reviewed and updated
- [ ] Code examples have been tested and verified
- [ ] Links have been checked and fixed
- [ ] Grammar and spelling have been reviewed
- [ ] Formatting issues have been resolved
- [ ] Related documentation has been cross-referenced
- [ ] Issue has been verified as resolved
